nodes.course_info:
LATV 103 Elementary Latvian (5)
Fundamentals of oral and written Latvian. Third in a sequence of three.

LATV 102 Elementary Latvian (5)
Fundamentals of oral and written Latvian. Second in a sequence of three.

LATV 101 Elementary Latvian (5)
Fundamentals of oral and written Latvian. First in a sequence of three.
View course details in MyPlan: LATV 101

LATV 113 Basic Latvian (3) I. GRINBERGA
Fundamentals of Latvian language in order to develop reading and comprehension proficiency. Completion of all three quarters does not meet the foreign language requirement.

LATV 111 Basic Latvian (3) I. GRINBERGA
Fundamentals of Latvian language in order to develop reading and comprehension proficiency. Completion of all three quarters does not meet the foreign language requirement. Offered: A.
View course details in MyPlan: LATV 111

LATV 112 Basic Latvian (3) I. GRINBERGA
Fundamentals of Latvian language in order to develop reading and comprehension proficiency. Completion of all three quarters does not meet the foreign language requirement.

LATV 250 Intensive Intermediate Latvian (15) VLPA
Accelerated second-year Latvian. Systematic review of Latvian grammar. Intensive practice in conversation, reading, and writing.

LATV 490 Supervised Reading (1-5, max. 10) VLPA
Readings in a selected area of Latvian language, culture, or society.
View course details in MyPlan: LATV 490

LATV 201 Second-Year Latvian (5) VLPA
Intensive practice in speaking, reading, and writing. Functional review of grammar. First in a sequence of three.

LATV 203 Second-Year Latvian (5) VLPA
Intensive practice in speaking, reading, and writing. Functional review of grammar. Third in a sequence of three.

LATV 150 Intensive Latvian (15)
Fundamentals of oral and written Latvian. Intensive practice in speaking, reading, and writing Latvian. Interactive classroom, computer-assisted learning, language, and reading laboratories. Emphasis on contemporary Latvian culture and society. If Latvian is the student's language of admission, only 10 credits count towards graduation.
View course details in MyPlan: LATV 150

LATV 202 Second-Year Latvian (5) VLPA
Intensive practice in speaking, reading, and writing. Functional review of grammar. Second in a sequence of three.

LATV 310 Topics in Latvian Literature (5, max. 15) VLPA
Topics in Latvian literature, life, and civilization.
View course details in MyPlan: LATV 310
